it.cnr.isti.thematrix.configuration.mapping

Class IadMapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.thematrix.configuration.mapping.IadMapping
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICheckable

    public class IadMapping
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICheckable
    This is the ROOT element of the XML configuration file for the mapping between the DBMS (LIAD) records and the IAD schema

      • getDatasetByName

        public Dataset getDatasetByName(java.lang.String datasetName)
        Retrieves a dataset mapping given its name. This class interfaces with XML parsing via annotations.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the symbolic name of the dataset (in the mapping file ?)
        Returns:
        a Dataset object (copy of the one requested).

      • getDatasetNames

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getDatasetNames()
        Retrieves all dataset names known from the mapping configuration; the order is taken from the private Collection dataset
        Returns:
        a newly created String Collection with the names
